name: Word Champs - unscramble the letters
description:
Word Champs is an exciting and addictive, real time, multiplayer word game with strategy in mind.

Gameplay: each user is given the same 20 random letters where each letter has some value assigned. In 40 seconds you need to come up with one word, which gives you as many points as possible. You can use no more than two letters from each colored block. It is up to you what strategy you choose to win the game. The one with the highest word score wins.

If you're a big fan of word games such Scrabble, Boggle, Ruzzle, AlphaBetty Saga or Word With Friends and want to play something that would help to progress in word building then you should give this a try! Word Champs is a great game to practice spelling skills and build your vocabulary.

Word Champs Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/wordchampspage

Use of this application requires a Facebook account.
